title: Newly rehabbed 2-bedroom house in West Philly/Cobbs Creek
description:
Whole house for rent starting June 1st. $1625/month.
Welcome to the best block of Addison Street.
The neighbors are really great, so friendly and everyone looks out for each other. Lots of little kids all the way up to some older folks who have lived on this block for over 40 years and raised their kids here. It is a good vibe!
Strong preference for only 2 adults to live here, if you want to have a total of 3 adults, I need to increase the price to $1800/month.
I bought this house in 2019 and have been living here with a friend for 4 years. I am moving out to live with my partner in Kensington/Fishtown.
The upstairs has 3 bedrooms but the middle room is so tiny and has no windows, it just doesn't work as a bedroom. It would be great for a nursery or a small office or storage space. So even though the house technically has 3 bedrooms, it really only works as a 2-bedroom home.
Full bathroom upstairs (shower/tub) and half bath on first floor. No bathroom in basement.
Carpet upstairs, hardwood on first floor, tile in basement.
Washer/dryer in basement, and they are enclosed in their own room with a door which makes the finished basement very usable as an office/man cave/home theater/hang out room/play room. Or just lots of storage!
978 square feet (that does not include the finished basement which is usable space).
Tenants pay electric and gas and internet, I will pay the water bill.
House has central air and central heat. Gas stove.
You are welcome to use window units during the summer months for the upstairs bedrooms if you prefer.
The central air works great on the first floor (and the basement of course) but it doesn't come through the upstairs vents very strong, the upstairs bedrooms always get very hot in the summer months.
Lease start date is June 1st but you can possible start moving stuff in sooner (no charge for early move-in).
Needed to move in: First month, last month and security deposit, total of $4,875.
Send me an email and let me know a bit about you.
Replies to this ad that just say "Is this available" will be deleted.
If this ad is still up, the house is still available.

title: Large 4 bedroom off UPenn
description:
Charming 4 bedroom home just 2 blocks from Penn’s campus.  This is the first and second floors of an 1862 historic brownstone.  The house features four large bedrooms, a large living room, separate dining room, separate kitchen, basement storage and laundry, three full bathrooms, and side driveway with parking available for rent.  This is the base of a "mother-in-law suite" - you would share a common staircase with tenants that live in the private 2 bedroom apartment on the 3rd floor. Kitchen is modern with dishwasher and garbage disposal.  Hardwood floors, 12' ceilings, and well preserved Victorian details throughout!
Utilities not included, however, the apartment has its own gas hot water heater and gas boiler so you only pay for what you use.  We own and manage the building and are on-call all the time.  This is not run by a management company

title: Spacious 3BR Townhome on Quiet Street in Pennsport!
description:
119 Titan Street
Philadelphia, PA 19147
*Pet Friendly
Large 3-story, 3 bedroom townhouse/row on a quiet street in the vibrant Pennsport neighborhood of Philadelphia. This spacious home is located close to restaurants, shopping, movies, schools/churches and transportation, with easy access to Center City, major highways (I-95, I-76, Delaware Avenue, etc.) and bridges (Ben Franklin and Walt Whitman).
1st Floor consists of an open floor plan with spacious living room, large dining room, and separate kitchen. Living room and dining room contain oak hardwood flooring, crown moldings and chair rail throughout. The large bright kitchen includes maple cabinets, counter, sink, appliances (including gas range, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and built-in microwave), tile floor, crown molding and chair rail. The sunny kitchen leads out to a private, enclosed back yard/patio with 6 foot wall surrounding it.
2nd Floor consists of large Master bedroom with 2 closets and original wood floors. The large renovated bathroom with full tub is located just off of the Master bedroom. In addition, there is a “Bonus Room” on this floor that could be used as an office or large walk-in closet.
3rd Floor consists of 2 bedrooms each with ample closet space and original wood floors
Finally, there is a large basement (unfinished) that includes washer/dryer plus tons of additional storage space.
SUMMARY:
• 3 bedrooms + bonus room (office or large walk-in closet)
• Large renovated bathroom with full-size tub
• Spacious living room and dining room with oak hardwood flooring, crown moldings, and chair rail throughout
• Bright, sunny, renovated kitchen with gas range, dishwasher, and built-in microwave
• Large, private, enclosed brick patio/backyard
• Ample closet space and basement storage
• Washer/dryer
• Convenient location
*Pet Friendly – Up to 2 cats or dogs permitted with additional security deposit of ½ month’s rent
$2000/month + utilities

title: Coworking Space, Community Lounge, In-unit laundry
description:
N Broad St, Philadelphia, PA 19123Welcome to Mily on Green. Designed for community, flexibility, and functionality, your new home offers spacious 2- and 3-bedroom apartments with high-end appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, and built-in storage. You’ll find beautiful amenities right outside your door, including a second floor lounge ideal for working parents. Divided into several separate but interconnected spaces, the lounge offers room for coworking, family time, and group gatherings, along with a dedicated space for children and playtime. For a breath of fresh air, head up to the expansive rooftop deck. There you’ll find a cozy indoor lounge that looks out onto the 9,700 square foot green roof, complete with a variety of seating perfect for gazing onto city views or taking in the lush rooftop landscaping. title: Up a spiral staircase, the large bedspace is revealed.
description: A classic loft overlooking an old-world Old City street, nestled between shopping and street life. You; ll find Strawberry Street between Second and Third, with the entry closest to Chestnut Street. Common spaces feature long-leaf yellow pine floors, which lead you straight to the unit. Take the oversized elevator to floor 4, and enter via a secluded hall. Let vibrant eastern light lead you from the front door to the living space. Peak out over 18th century rooftops while you relax high above this quiet street. The open concept includes dining space just before the breakfast bar, beyond which is the kitchen. This cooking space offers sleek black cabinetry, gas range, full sized dishwasher, and poured concrete countertops.

title: Unique 1 BR house, perfect location
description:
An incredible opportunity to live in a space all to yourself, in a great location for a reasonable price!
This trinity design dates to the early 20th century and has a lot of charm from a cottage sink to hardwood floors and a claw foot bathtub.
A one bedroom unit, it’s a great space for an individual or couple looking for their own home, spread out on multiple floors. The first floor features a kitchen, the 2nd floor has a bedroom and bathroom (recently renovated), and a third floor has a large room with high ceilings offering a great space for a living room with room for a work nook.
The basement has a new washer and dryer. Water is included; tenant pays gas and electric which tend to be very low. There is no central air, but window units are provided.
10 minute walk to girard street station on market frankford el; within minutes to frankford street retail and restaurants like Saraya, La Colombe, Mulherns, and local art at the Crane Arts Building and newly located Clay Studio, and so much more.
Available MAY 1. Asking $1,400, first month, last month, and security. Credit check/application required.

description:

This unit is one of 17 luxury apartments with a doorperson and direct access to the fantastic amenities at the neighboring Renaissance Hotel including the gorgeous pool, fitness and business centers, and discounts on food, beverages, and hotel rooms. Light-filled open concept living and dining space with hardwood floors throughout and a custom-built seating nook. Beautiful one-bedroom with a lovely, shared courtyard and private deck!! This unit features a decorative fireplace, real hardwood floors throughout, and an updated kitchen fully equipped with stainless steel appliances. The building is located on the 1600 block of Pine Street in the prestigious Rittenhouse Square area, only a few short blocks from Rittenhouse Square Park! This neighborhood is quaint and residential while remaining within walking distance of all center city attractions, parks, shopping, nightlife, and more. Only a few short blocks from Avenue of the Arts, the Kimmel Center, and all forms of public transportation!
